title: NFL Monday Night Football average viewers 2015 to 2019
summary: An average of 12.9 millions Viewers tuned in to watch Monday Night Football in the country during the 2019 2015 season , an increase of half a millions on the previous Year .
Ratings for Monday Night Football also increased in 2019 , with the average number of Viewers increasing to 12.6 millions .

Prime-time packages receive ratings boost Monday Night Football is part of the prime-time television schedule that also includes Monday Night Football and Sunday Night Football – these NFL games are broadcast across the entire country by one major national network .
gold: Monday Night Football averaged 12.6 million viewers in the United States during the 2019 NFL season , an increase of around one million on the previous year.
Although viewing figures have increased , they are still down on the 12.9 million viewers in 2015.

Sunday , Monday , happy nights The NFL has prime-time games that are broadcast across the entire United States by one major network on Thursday night , Sunday night , and Monday night – these games start at around 8:30 pm Eastern Time .
